data.title: Princeton University
data.meta_description: Blake Peters (24) Guard - In The Record Book #23, Most Made Three-Point Field Goals in a Career, 122 (2021-present) #24, Most Made Three-Point Field Goals in...
data.text:
In The Record Book

#23, Most Made Three-Point Field Goals in a Career, 122 (2021-present)

#24, Most Made Three-Point Field Goals in a Season, 64 (2023-24)

Featured

Princeton's Blake Peters Is The Most Interesting Man In The NCAA Tournament - Steve Politi, NJ.com

Chicagoland To Princeton To Sweet 16? Blake Peters, Caden Pierce Shining In The Moment - Steve Greenberg, Chicago Sun Times

From ETHS To Princeton 'Anything Is Possible' In Blake Peters' Basketball Life - Will Klearman, Evanston Roundtable

Princeton's Peters Leads Improbable NCAA Run - David Ostrowsky, Atlanta Jewish Times

Given Bigger Role, Blake Peters Siezes Opportunity With Princeton Men's Basketball - Kyle Franko, The Trentonian

After Helping US Squad Earn Gold At Maccabiah Games, Peters Primed For Big Sophomore Year With PU Men's Hoops - Bill Alden, Town Topics

The Make Shots Podcast - Feb. 11, 2022

2023-24: Started all 29 games … ranked fifth in the Ivy League in made three-pointers (64) and sixth in made three-point field goals-per-game (2.2) … made at least three three-pointers in 12 games … scored a season-high 17 points on 5-for-7 shooting from three and 2-for-2 from the free throw line while also recording four rebounds and two steals in a victory over Columbia in Jadwin on Mar. 1 … scored 15 points on Nov. 10 in a road win at Hofstra … finished with 15 points and shot 5-for-9 from three in a victory at Columbia on Jan. 20 … scored 12 points, made four three-pointers and pulled down four rebounds on Mar. 20 in the NIT semifinal against UNLV … recorded 12 points and made four three-pointers in a win over Penn in Jadwin on Feb. 10 … scored 12 points and made four three-pointers on the road in a victory over Old Dominion on Nov. 22 … finished with 11 points, a season-high four steals and three rebounds in the Tigers’ victory at Duquesne on Nov. 15 … pulled down a season-high seven rebounds on Dec. 30 in a win at Delaware

2022-23: Appeared in all 32 games … ranked seventh in the Ivy League in three-point percentage (40.5%) … ranked eighth in the Ivy League in made three-point field goals (54) and ninth in three-point field goals per game (1.7) … scored a season-high 17 points on 5-for-8 shooting from the three in the Tigers’ NCAA Tournament Round of 32 victory over Missouri on Mar. 18 … finished with 17 points on 5-for-8 shooting and five rebounds on Feb. 17 against Brown … scored 16 points on 5-for-7 shooting from three on Feb. 2 against Cornell … had 15 points on 5-for-9 shooting from three at the London Classic against Army on Nov. 24 … grabbed a season-high six rebounds and handed out a season-high four assists against Kean on Dec. 23

2021-22: Appeared in 14 games ... scored a season-high five points and pulled down a season-high five rebounds against Dartmouth on Feb. 12 ... handed out a season-high three assists against Kean on Dec. 21.

Athletic Accomplishments: #13 ranked player in Illinois by PrepHoops … four-year high school varsity starter … IHSA 4A third-place finish 2018 … IHSA 4A second-place finish 2019, 2020 Centralia Holiday Tournament MVP … Evanston Township High School’s All-time Leading Scorer (1,585) … Evanston’s All-time leader in three-point fgm in a career (332) … ETHS record for most three-point fgm in a season (114) … ETHS record for most three-point fgm in a game (nine) … 15th all time in most 3-point fgm in IHSA history … three-time CSL South All-Conference selection … IBCA Class 4A Second Team All-State 2020 … Chicago Sun-Times First Team All-State 2021 … IBCA First Team All-State 2021 … Leo J. Samuelson Award winner recognizing best Male Evanston high school athlete … nominated for an ESPY “Best Play” award in 2018 for a full-court game-winning shot … graduated with the highest honor … Freshman Honor Society Member … Sophomore Honor Society Member

Personal: Son of Ashley and Shana Peters … has a younger brother, Ian … plays Spanish classical guitar … speaks fluent Chinese
